split.metaDescription: Split PDF files online for free. Extract specific pages from your PDF documents quickly and securely. No registration required, 100% client-side processing.
split.heading: Free Online PDF Splitter Tool
split.description1: Our free online PDF splitter allows you to extract specific pages from your PDF documents effortlessly. Whether you need to separate a single page or multiple pages, our tool provides a fast, secure, and user-friendly solution.
split.step1: Upload your PDF file by dragging and dropping or clicking to browse
split.step2: Select the pages you want to extract by clicking on them or entering page ranges
split.step3: Click 'Download Selected Pages' to get your new PDF file
split.feature1: 100% Free - No hidden costs or subscriptions
split.feature2: Secure - All processing happens in your browser, files never leave your device
split.feature3: No Registration - Start splitting PDFs immediately
split.feature4: Fast - Instant processing with no upload time
split.whyDescription: Splitting PDF files is useful for extracting specific chapters, sharing selected pages, reducing file size, or organizing documents. Whether you're a student, professional, or casual user, our PDF splitter makes the process simple and efficient.

merge.metaDescription: Merge multiple PDF files into one document online for free. Combine PDFs quickly and securely with no registration required. 100% client-side processing.
merge.heading: Free Online PDF Merger Tool
merge.description1: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document with our free online PDF merger. Perfect for consolidating reports, combining chapters, or organizing multiple documents into one professional file.
merge.step1: Upload multiple PDF files by dragging and dropping or clicking to browse
merge.step2: Arrange the files in your desired order by dragging them
merge.step3: Click 'Merge All PDFs' to combine them into a single document
merge.feature1: Unlimited Files - Merge as many PDFs as you need
merge.feature2: Drag and Drop - Easy reordering of files before merging
merge.feature3: Private - Your files stay on your device, never uploaded to servers
merge.feature4: Fast Merging - Instant combination of multiple PDFs
merge.whyDescription: Merging PDFs is essential for creating comprehensive documents, combining multiple invoices, consolidating reports, or preparing documents for printing. Our tool makes it easy to combine PDFs while maintaining quality and formatting.

imageToPdf.metaDescription: Convert images to PDF online for free. Transform JPG, PNG, and JPEG files into PDF documents quickly. No file upload required, 100% secure and private.
imageToPdf.heading: Free Image to PDF Converter
imageToPdf.description1: Convert your images (JPG, PNG, JPEG) into PDF format with our free online converter. Perfect for creating PDF portfolios, converting scanned documents, or archiving photos in a universal format.
imageToPdf.howToTitle: How to Convert Images to PDF
imageToPdf.step1: Upload one or more images (JPG, PNG, JPEG) by dragging and dropping or browsing
imageToPdf.step2: Arrange the images in your preferred order
imageToPdf.step3: Click 'Convert to PDF' to create your PDF document
imageToPdf.feature1: Multiple Formats - Supports JPG, PNG, and JPEG
imageToPdf.feature2: Batch Conversion - Convert multiple images at once
imageToPdf.feature3: Quality Preserved - Original image quality maintained
imageToPdf.whyDescription: Converting images to PDF creates a universal format that's easy to share, print, and archive. PDFs preserve image quality and formatting across all devices and platforms, making them ideal for professional documents, presentations, and portfolios.

organizePdf.metaDescription: Organize PDF pages online for free. Reorder, rearrange, and delete pages from your PDF documents. 100% client-side processing, no upload required.
organizePdf.heading: Free Online PDF Page Organizer
organizePdf.description1: Organize your PDF documents by reordering and deleting pages with our free online tool. Drag and drop pages to rearrange them, remove unwanted pages, and create a perfectly organized PDF. All processing happens in your browser.
organizePdf.step1: Upload your PDF file by dragging and dropping or clicking to browse
organizePdf.step2: Drag pages to reorder them or click the delete button to remove unwanted pages
organizePdf.step3: Click 'Download Organized PDF' to save your reorganized document
organizePdf.feature1: Drag & Drop - Easy page reordering with visual feedback
organizePdf.feature2: Delete Pages - Remove unwanted pages with one click
organizePdf.feature3: 100% Private - All processing happens locally in your browser
organizePdf.feature4: No Limits - Organize PDFs of any size with unlimited pages
organizePdf.whyDescription: Organizing PDF pages is essential for creating professional documents, removing unnecessary content, fixing page order mistakes, or preparing documents for printing. Our tool makes it easy to rearrange and clean up your PDFs while maintaining quality and formatting.

compressPdf.metaDescription: Compress PDF files online for free. Reduce PDF file size while maintaining quality. 100% client-side processing, secure and private.
compressPdf.heading: Free Online PDF Compressor
compressPdf.description1: Compress your PDF files to reduce file size with our free online tool. Optimize images, remove duplicate data, and make your PDFs smaller for easier sharing and faster uploads. All processing happens locally in your browser for maximum privacy.
compressPdf.step1: Upload your PDF file by dragging and dropping or clicking to browse
compressPdf.step2: Choose your quality level (high, medium, or low compression)
compressPdf.step3: Click 'Compress PDF' and download your optimized file
compressPdf.feature1: Smart Compression - Reduce file size without visible quality loss
compressPdf.feature2: Quality Control - Choose compression level based on your needs
compressPdf.feature3: 100% Secure - Files never leave your browser, processed locally
compressPdf.feature4: Fast Processing - Instant compression with no upload delays
compressPdf.whyDescription: Compressing PDFs is essential for email attachments, faster website loading, saving storage space, and meeting file size limits. Our tool uses smart compression algorithms to significantly reduce file size while maintaining document quality and readability.

pageNumbering.metaDescription: Add page numbers to PDF online for free. Customize position, style, and format. Multiple numbering options including Roman numerals. 100% client-side processing.
pageNumbering.heading: Free Online PDF Page Numbering Tool
pageNumbering.description1: Add professional page numbers to your PDF documents with our free online tool. Choose from multiple numbering styles (numeric, Roman, alphabetical), customize position, font size, colors, and margins. All processing happens in your browser for complete privacy.
pageNumbering.howToTitle: How to Add Page Numbers to PDF
pageNumbering.step1: Upload your PDF file by dragging and dropping or clicking to browse
pageNumbering.step2: Choose number position, style (1,2,3 or i,ii,iii or a,b,c), font size, and colors
pageNumbering.step3: Customize prefix, suffix, starting page and number if needed
pageNumbering.step4: Click 'Add Page Numbers' and download your numbered PDF
pageNumbering.feature1: 9 Position Options - Place numbers anywhere on the page with visual selector
pageNumbering.feature2: Multiple Styles - Numeric, Roman numerals (upper/lower), Alphabetical (upper/lower)
pageNumbering.feature3: Customizable - Adjust font size, color, margins, prefix and suffix
pageNumbering.feature4: Flexible Start - Choose which page to start numbering and what number to begin with
pageNumbering.feature5: 100% Private - All processing happens locally in your browser
pageNumbering.whyTitle: Why Add Page Numbers to PDFs?
pageNumbering.whyDescription: Page numbers are essential for professional documents, academic papers, legal documents, reports, and manuscripts. They help readers navigate long documents, reference specific pages, and maintain organization. Our tool makes it easy to add customized page numbers with full control over position, style, and formatting.

pdfToImages.metaDescription: Convert PDF to images online for free. Extract each page as PNG, JPEG, or WebP. High quality conversion, no upload required, 100% client-side processing.
pdfToImages.heading: Free Online PDF to Images Converter
pdfToImages.description1: Convert your PDF documents into individual images with our free online converter. Each page becomes a separate high-quality image file in PNG, JPEG, or WebP format. Perfect for extracting pages, creating presentations, or sharing specific pages.
pdfToImages.howToTitle: How to Convert PDF to Images
pdfToImages.step1: Upload your PDF file by dragging and dropping or clicking to browse
pdfToImages.step2: Choose your preferred image format (PNG, JPEG, or WebP) and quality settings
pdfToImages.step3: Click convert and download all images or individual pages
pdfToImages.feature1: Multiple Formats - Export as PNG, JPEG, or WebP with quality control
pdfToImages.feature2: High Quality - 2x scaling ensures crisp, clear images
pdfToImages.feature3: 100% Private - All processing happens locally in your browser
pdfToImages.feature4: Batch Download - Download all images at once or individually
pdfToImages.whyDescription: Converting PDF pages to images is useful for creating presentations, sharing specific pages on social media, embedding in documents, creating thumbnails, or archiving important pages. Our tool makes it easy to extract any page as a high-quality image file.

ocr.metaDescription: Extract text from scanned PDFs with OCR online for free. Detect tables, key-value pairs, and export data in CSV, JSON, or TXT format. 100% client-side processing.
ocr.heading: Free Online PDF OCR & Data Extraction Tool
ocr.description1: Extract text from scanned PDFs and images using advanced OCR technology. Our tool runs entirely in your browser, automatically detects tables, finds key-value pairs, and allows you to export data in multiple formats. Perfect for digitizing documents, extracting data, and making scanned PDFs searchable.
ocr.step1: Upload your PDF file (scanned or digital)
ocr.step2: Select OCR language and wait for automatic text extraction
ocr.step3: Review detected tables and key-value pairs
ocr.step4: Export extracted data in CSV, JSON, or TXT format
ocr.feature1: Advanced OCR - Extract text from scanned documents with high accuracy
ocr.feature2: Table Detection - Automatically identify and extract tabular data
ocr.feature3: Data Extraction - Find key-value pairs and structured information
ocr.feature4: Multiple Export Formats - Save as CSV, JSON, or plain text
ocr.feature5: 10+ Languages - Supports English, French, Spanish, German, and more
ocr.whyDescription: OCR technology makes scanned documents searchable and editable. Extract data from invoices, forms, receipts, contracts, or any scanned document. Perfect for digitizing archives, automating data entry, or making old documents accessible. All processing happens in your browser for maximum privacy and security.
